Yujie is Research Scientist working on plant ecophysiology, vegetation optimality, and land surface modeling.


## Education

- [PhD in Biology]{.fw-bold} | University of Utah, USA | 2015 -  2019
- [MS in Biology]{.fw-bold} | University of Science and Technology of China, China | 2011 -  2013
- [BS in Biology]{.fw-bold} | University of Science and Technology of China, China | 2007 -  2011


## Professional Experience

- [2022-present:]{.fw-bold} Research Scientist, Caltech
- [2020-2022:]{.fw-bold} Postdoctoral Fellow, Caltech
